Hero.name: Milton
Hero.desc: A master of the incendiary arts, Milton's talents are oft overlooked due to his poor communication skills and affinity for staplers of the red Swingline variety.

Hero.name: Stu Steiner
Hero.desc: Legend has it that he once deadlocked Chuck Norris with a single thread. All we know is that he's somewhere in the building. Because we hear him.

Hero.name: Carty
Hero.desc: All you need is love. That, and a big shield. Who ever said gnomes are only for gardens? This one just shattered your femur.
